dict.string:
Disables video controls from displaying/popping up when changing the volume via the rockers. Useful for users annoyed by this native feature. Made after reading a request on r/jailbreak.
[v.2] Tested with an iP6+ 8.4. (9-6-15)
⚑ UPDATES: (4-23-15) *Initial release (9-6-15) *Changed method so CC shows vol changes
★ If you'd like to donate via PayPal, please send money to...
☞ goin730@gmail.com
Disable Video Controls on Volume Change ₉₋₆₋₁₅ ⚑
